reviews.review_msg: I was less thrilled about her than most comments here. She really LOVES her theory, and I don't. If you like classic power theorists and French philosophers this is definitely a good shot, but I found it much too dry. As a person Brenda is great though and will do anything in her power to help students.
Logan was an excellent instructor. Class was fun and we learnt new aspects of Human Security. Will take a class with him again.
Excellent course. Online courses are horrible, but his structure is quite good.
